page: CE60134: Analysis And Evaluation Of Transportation Systems

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to Transportation Systems Analysis and Issues, Analysis of Transportation Facilities, Traffic Impact Studies, Introduction to Transportation Economics, Demand for Transportation, Costs of Transport, Pricing of Transport Services, Traffic Congestion, Regulation of Supply of Transport Capacity, Appraisal and Economic Evaluation of Transportation Projects, Case Studies
